movie.title: The Crucifixion
movie.description_intro: When Nicole comes in contact with Father Anton (Corneliu Ulici) more and more inexplicable events occur. The pair begin to believe that the priest lost the battle with a demon.
movie.description_full: When Nicole comes in contact with Father Anton (Corneliu Ulici) more and more inexplicable events occur. The pair begin to believe that the priest lost the battle with a demon.

movies.title: Pro Wrestlers vs Zombies
movies.summary: The Franchise Shane Douglas accidentally kills a wrestler in the ring. The wrestler's brother Angus seeks revenge by surrendering his soul to an ancient demon to gain the power to raise the undead. Angus then pays for a private show at an empty prison to lure Douglas and his friend Rowdy Roddy Piper into a death trap.

Angus then pays for a private show at an empty prison to lure Douglas and his friend Rowdy Roddy Piper into a death trap.

movies.title: Red Clover
movies.summary: A young woman accidentally releases a homicidal leprechaun while hunting, which brings back memories of her town's deadly past.
movies.description_full: A young woman accidentally releases a homicidal leprechaun while hunting, which brings back memories of her town's deadly past.
movies.synopsis: A young woman accidentally releases a homicidal leprechaun while hunting, which brings back memories of her town's deadly past.

movies.title: High Life
movies.summary: Takes place beyond the solar system in a future that seems like the present. About a group of criminals who accept a mission in space to become the subjects of a human reproduction experiment. They find themselves in the most unimaginable situation after a storm of cosmic rays hit the ship.

movies.title: The Stuff
movies.summary: When a mysterious, white, and gooey but delicious substance begins oozing from the Earth's surface, it makes a great new dessert product, but this new dessert has a sinister origin: it's an entity that takes over its victims' minds while making them crave more of it.
